org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker

Class RunConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker.RunConnection

  • public class RunConnection
extends Object
    The representation of the connections to the runs that actually participates in the persistence system.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

      • toDBform

        @Nonnull
public static RunConnection toDBform(@Nonnull
                                              RemoteRunDelegate rrd)
                                       throws IOException
        Manufacture a persistent representation of the given workflow run. Must be called within the context of a transaction.
        Parameters:
        rrd - The remote delegate of the workflow run.
        Returns:
        The persistent object.
        Throws:
        IOException - If serialisation fails.

      • fromDBform

        @Nonnull
public RemoteRunDelegate fromDBform(@Nonnull
                                             RunDBSupport db)
                                      throws Exception
        Get the remote run delegate for a particular persistent connection. Must be called within the context of a transaction.
        Parameters:
        db - The database facade.
        Returns:
        The delegate object.
        Throws:
        Exception - If anything goes wrong.

      • makeChanges

        public void makeChanges(@Nonnull
                        RemoteRunDelegate rrd)
                 throws IOException
        Flush changes from a remote run delegate to the database. Must be called within the context of a transaction.
        Parameters:
        rrd - The remote run delegate object that has potential changes.
        Throws:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong in serialization.
